unnormalised: Hey guys, training regimens are fascinating! Remember Dhyan Chand? His dedication was legendary. It’s not just about raw talent, but planned schedules. My cousin, Dr. Sharma at AIIMS, says even optimal diets need tailored workouts. I’m looking to improve my badminton, thinking of a daily 5 km run and court practice in our 1000 sq ft backyard. What worked for you folks? Anyone from IIT with specific insights? Training costs in Rs. are also a concern.
normalised: Hey guys, training regimens are fascinating! Remember Dhyan Chand? His dedication was legendary. It’s not just about raw talent, but planned schedules. My cousin, Doctor Sharma at A I I M S, says even optimal diets need tailored workouts. I’m looking to improve my badminton, thinking of a daily five kilometer run and court practice in our one thousand square feet backyard. What worked for you folks?
